General.Name: Conduit Capital Ltd
General.Description: Conduit Capital Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the insurance business in South Africa. It operates through Insurance and Risk, and Investments segments. The company offers insurance and risk management solutions, which include medical malpractice, health, life, and property and casualty services. It is also involved in the public equity and private investment activities. The company was formerly known as IMR Investments Ltd and changed its name to Conduit Capital Limited in May 2005. Conduit Capital Limited was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Bryanston, South Africa.
